string.value: #p1061005# in #b#m105040300##k has something he wants to say to you. Go see #b#p1061005##k.

#p1061005# says that #p1040001# has told him that you are a very capable Guard and asks that you help him. According to him, someone has stolen an expensive herb, and he is sure it is a thief from #m103000000#. He asks that you go to #b#m103000000##k and investigate. You suddenly remember that Alex is in Kerning City. For now go see #bAlex#k.

When you tell #p1061005# that you don't think it was a thief from #m103000000#, he says that he will wait for your investigation for now.
Oh, are you Evan? I've heard so much about you from #p1040001#. He told me what a great Guard you are. That's why I thought you could help me.
My job is to collect herbs and make them into medicine. But recently, someone stole one of my herbs! It was a very rare and expensive herb! Do you think you can catch the thief for me?
It's doubtful that there are thieves in #m105040300# so I'm certain that a thief from #m103000000# stole it! Can you go to #m103000000# to investigate and bring back my herb?
How should go about the investigation? Er, shouldn't you know that? Maybe look around and search for a witness? Try talking to someone you know in #b#m103000000#... I don't know. That's YOUR job!
I didn't think you would refuse. #p1040001# told me what a great person you are but I guess he was wrong.
You've returned! So who was the thief? What? You haven't caught the thief yet?

It's hard for me to believe that the Thieves in #m103000000# aren't responsible... But since they are willing to put their honor on the line to help find the culprit, I will trust them for now. Now, please find the thief.
Have you gone to #m103000000# yet? Until my herb is returned, I don't think I'll even be able to sleep at night. Please go to #b#m103000000# and start your investigation#k.
